attributes.action: Save the PotNoodle factory (Unilever) crumlin caerphilly south wales
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Job's are set to be axed at crumlin's pot noodle factory which employs over 200 people .
The crumlin factory opened in 1979 is the only manufacturing plant in wales ,produces all unilever pot noodles products and its stafff featured in a high profile television advertisement campaign .
Unilever is a important employee in the valley and we are  concerned about the future of the local people and there familys .
The workforce are tremendous and very hard working employees . 
Please help us keep the potnoodle factory open .
